title: A Question of attitude
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, John Martin-Jones and Stuart Glover
brief_description: Discusses the problem of finding work for physically handicapped people, showing many examples of successful workers in varied skilled positions. Argues that employers’ reluctance to make positions available is the main difficulty.
